dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically take calculated risks to achieve their goals.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options and avoid taking unnecessary risks.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use evidence-based reasoning to make decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and emotional connections to guide their analysis.

dimensions.label: Social Connection
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out social interactions and connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer one-on-one interactions or smaller group settings.

dimensions.label: Career Focus
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for leadership positions and promotions.
Your FarTwin will pursue careers that allow for creative expression.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer experiential learning and practical application.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical foundations.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions to those close to them.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider when and how they share their emotions.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on completing tasks within tight deadlines.
Your FarTwin will take a more flexible approach to meeting obligations.

dimensions.label: Adventure Seeker
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach travel and exploration?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new experiences and adrenaline-pumping activities.
Your FarTwin will focus on immersing themselves in local cultures and traditions.
